DoingBusinessAsName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: MARY FREE BED BRACE AND CORSET SHOP

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO RESTORE INDEPENDENCE, HOPE AND FREEDOM TO PEOPLE NEEDING ORTHOTIC, PROSTHETIC, SEATING AND ADAPTIVE EQUIPMENT. WE SEEK EXCELLENCE THROUGH INNOVATION, LEADERSHIP AND ADVOCACY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO RESTORE INDEPENDENCE, HOPE AND FREEDOM TO PEOPLE NEEDING ORTHOTIC, PROSTHETIC, SEATING AND ADAPTIVE EQUIPMENT. WE SEEK EXCELLENCE THROUGH INNOVATION, LEADERSHIP AND ADVOCACY.
IRS990.Desc: SERVICES INCLUDE THE FITTING, DESIGNING AND FABRICATION OF ORTHOTIC DEVICES FOR PHYSICALLY AFFECTED INDIVIDUALS. -5,341 PATIENT TRANSACTIONS FOR FISCAL YEAR 3/31/2018.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: SERVICES INCLUDE THE FITTING, DESIGNING AND FABRICATION OF PROSTHETIC DEVICES FOR PHYSICALLY AFFECTED INDIVIDUALS. -671 PATIENT TRANSACTIONS FOR FISCAL YEAR 3/31/2018.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: SERVICES INCLUDE THE FITTING, DESIGNING, FABRICATION AND INSTALLATION OF WHEELCHAIR SEATING AND ASSISTIVE TECHNOLOGY DEVICES. -678 PATIENT TRANSACTIONS FOR FISCAL YEAR 3/31/2018.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: SATELLITE CLINICS - PROVIDING SERVICES TO PEOPLE NEEDING ORTHOTIC, PROSTHETIC, AND SEATING AND ADAPTIVE EQUIPMENT. -2,622 PATIENT TRANSACTIONS FOR FISCAL YEAR 3/31/2018.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART III, LINE 12, EXPLANATION OF OTHER INCOME:

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A PORTION OF DUES PAID TO BOC, MOPA AND AOPA IS ALLOCATED TO LOBBYING.

THE ORGANIZATIONS PRESIDENT/SECRETARY/TREASURER, KENT RIDDLE, IS COMPENSATED BY A RELATED PARTY WHO USES A COMPENSATION COMMITTEE, FORM 990 OF OTHER ORGANIZATIONS, COMPENSATION SURVEY OR STUDY, AND APPROVAL BY THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE TO DETERMINE HIS COMPENSATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MARY FREE BED GUILD IS THE SOLE SHAREHOLDER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MARY FREE BED GUILD, THE SOLE SHAREHOLDER, HOLDS 50% OF THE BOARD POSITIONS WHICH EXERCISE THE RIGHT TO ELECT BOARD MEMBERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: APPROVAL OF MARY FREE BED GUILD IN ITS CAPACITY AS SOLE CORPORATE SHAREHOLDER SHALL BE REQUIRED: A. TO CHANGE THE PURPOSE OR PHILOSOPHY OF THE CORPORATION; B. TO AMEND THE ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION OR BYLAWS OF THE CORPORATION; C. TO DISSOLVE OR LIQUIDATE THE CORPORATION; D. TO MERGE OR CONSOLIDATE WITH ANOTHER CORPORATION; E. TO REMOVE THE TRUSTEES OF THE CORPORATION; F. TO CREATE OR ACQUIRE A NEW SUBSIDIARY CORPORATION, OR TO SELL OR OTHERWISE DISPOSE OF EXISTING SUBSIDIARIES; G. TO PURCHASE, ACQUIRE, SELL, LEASE, EXCHANGE, MORTGAGE, GIVE AS SECURITY, OR DISPOSE OF ANY REAL PROPERTY OWNED, HELD OR LEASED BY THE CORPORATION; H. TO GUARANTEE THE DEBT OF OTHERS BY THE CORPORATION; I. TO ADOPT ANY LONG-RANGE PLAN OF THE CORPORATION; J. IN OTHER CASES WHERE REQUIRED BY LAW.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE CFO PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICIES ARE UPDATED ANNUALLY BY ALL BOARD MEMBERS, OFFICERS AND STAFF. PROCESS IS ADMINISTERED OUT OF THE EXECUTIVE ADMINISTRATION OFFICE. ANY DISCLOSED CONFLICTS OF INTEREST WOULD BE DISCLOSED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND ASSURANCES OBTAINED THAT NO ILLEGAL OR SUBSIDIZED ACTIVITIES ARE OCCURRING. IF A CONFLICT OF INTEREST IS EXPOSED, THE INDIVIDUAL WHO IS THE SUBJECT OF THE CONFLICT IS EXCUSED FROM THE MEETING SO THE REST OF THE BOARD MAY DISCUSS THE ISSUE AND TAKE APPROPRIATE ACTION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: HUMAN RESOURCES REVIEWS MARKET DATA OF COMPARABLE POSITIONS AND IS USED TO ESTABLISH SALARY RANGES. RECOMMENDATIONS FOR MERIT RATE CHANGES AND LUMP SUMS BASED ON LONGEVITY, SUSTAINED PERFFORMANCE, GOAL ATTAINMENTS AND STANDARDS OF BEHAVIOR ARE REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY LEADERSHIP AND THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AS PART OF THE BUDGET PROCESS. THE PROCESS WAS LAST UNDERTAKEN IN FY 2018.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE NOT AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION. FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE SUMMARIZED IN AN ANNUAL REPORT WHICH IS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC.
THERE HAS BEEN NO CHANGE IN PROCESS FROM PRIOR YEAR.

DisregardedEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: MARY FREE BED REHABILITATION HOSPITAL FOUNDATION
